meta.name: The Weekend View
meta.description: The Weekend View will focus on the biggest stories in entertainment and the buzziest news topping social media feeds. With all-new "Hot Topics," the co-hosts will give their one-of-a-kind takes with their signature candor and humor. Plus, "The Weekend View" will include "Behind the Table" segments with executive producer Brian Teta and the co-hosts as they dive deeper into pop-culture stories from the week.

videos.title: Dec 6, 2025
videos.overview: Schumer On Weight Loss Rumors - Kathryn Hahn Gets Real About Marriage - Dobrev's Post Break-up "Revenge Yacht" Trip - Kourtney K. Won't Parent Like Mom Kris - Can Gossip Set You Free from Friend Drama? - Behind the Table: Who are the Loves of Your Life?
